attributes.action: Put an end to the bullying and unfair treatment of Jeremy Corbyn
attributes.additional_details: The way Jeremy Corbyn has been treated in the past week by members of his own party and by David Cameron - the same man who is responsible for running our country into the ground - is unacceptable. An employer would face an Employment Tribunal for treating an employee the way Corbyn has been treated.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn, over the past week, has been bullied and pressured into stepping down as leader of the Labour party. I am calling for this to stop and to show the ongoing support that exists for Corbyn.
